page.title: 19School Leavers
page.content: James Steedman left school in May 1985 at the age of sixteen and does not have a job.He is a very good cook and has won various competitions so he would like to find employment in catering.Although he loves the village,he feels that it can be dull for people of his age.If he stays he will almost certainly not find work as for boys like him there is nothing but farming or forestry jobs.He hates the thought of having to do these but,even if he wanted to,his chances are limited of getting employment here anyway.In his heart he knows that to find a job,any job,he will have to follow the example of many of the other young people from the village and leave.This makes him very sad.
